extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Access to Built-in Verve Account
extracted_playbook.description: Limit access to the built-in 'verve' account to only administrators who need to perform administrative functions. Use separate accounts for day-to-day functions.

extracted_playbook.title: Change Password for Built-in Verve Account
extracted_playbook.description: Change the password for the built-in 'verve' account if it has been shared.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Privileges for Other Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Assign users the built-in roles in Verve Reporting to limit permissions and prevent execution of the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Machine Learning in Elasticsearch
extracted_playbook.description: Disable machine learning in the Elasticsearch configuration override. Contact Verve support for assistance if needed.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Verve Reporting from Verve Software Manager
extracted_playbook.description: Disable Verve Reporting from the Verve Software Manager, update the Elasticsearch configuration, and confirm that 'Machine Learning' is no longer listed in the main navigation bar under Analytics.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the Internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Control System Networks Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Methods for Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, following CISA's guidance and best practices.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to CISA's guidance on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
